name: こいじばし
summary: Yuta Tachibana was supposed to graduate this march, but he decided to do a graduation trip with his childhood friend instead. In their destination, they find Yuta's cousin waiting in a bridge rumoured to bring fortune to lovers. What Yuta doesn't know is that even stranger things are waiting around the corner...
info:
• 中文名: 恋路桥
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 2004/08/13
  • 官方网站: http://deal.co.jp/raccoon/
  • 开发: Raccoon
  • 原画: M4-10c
  • 剧本: Revoenil
